item.title: Compile Shogun with SVMLight
item.author: Author
item.description: The multi-kernel learning toolbox shogun is really hard to compile. It took me a few hours to success! Why compile chogun from source ? The conda version of shogun is complied without SVMLight. But Multi-kernel learning in shogun depends on it. To do it, follow these steps: 1. git lone the souces code 1 git clone https://github.
